description: Universal React library, write and compose WebGL shaders, implement complex effects using a descriptive paradigm

scripts.prepublish: cd ../.. && export PATH=$(npm bin):$PATH && cd - && rm -rf lib gl-react.js && babel --source-maps -d lib src && flow-copy-source -v src lib && browserify lib/index.js -t [ browserify-shim ] --standalone GLReact > gl-react.js
scripts.watch: cd ../.. && export PATH=$(npm bin):$PATH && cd - && babel --watch --source-maps -d lib src
